name: Fast & Funeral
description:
You lost the corpse minutes away from the funeral! Eavesdrop conversations between the relatives to rebuild their loved one!

Use WASD to move, left mouse click to Grab/Attach/Release (or Throw by long press)

Developed in 48 hours for GGJ21 (remote edition), Theme was "Lost and Found"
